content:
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to help. I hope you and your family have an amazing time on your next road trip and create wonderful memories together. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further recommendations.

Remember to stay safe, enjoy the scenic routes, and take in the breathtaking views. And don't forget to stop at those quirky roadside attractions – they can be a lot of fun!

Happy travels, and I wish you a wonderful adventure!
